welcome_message_body: "Welcome to East Islip, a charming town known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport handles all commercial flights and provides various amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Republic Field Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering exclusive services and facilities.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brookhaven Airport serves domestic flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Brookhaven Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing exclusive services for a seamless travel experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all travelers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Suffolk County Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Suffolk County Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.
